briefdescription.para: returns the number of bits set in a bitmask i

returns the the index of n-th bit set in a bit mask counting from the right, for instance, in a mask ..0110 1000 , the 0th set bit(right-most bit set to 1) is at 3th position(starting at 0), 1st bit is at 5th position, 2nd bit is at 6th position etc..
Returns a random int number between and min [inclusive] and max [exclusive].

simplesect.para:
int - Random number in range Print(Math.RandomInt(0,1));//only0 Print(Math.RandomInt(0,2));//0or1
>>0 >>1

briefdescription.para: Returns a random int number between and min [inclusive] and max [inclusive].

simplesect.para:
int - Random number in range Print(Math.RandomIntInclusive(0,1));//0or1 Print(Math.RandomIntInclusive(0,2));//0,1,2
>>1 >>2

briefdescription.para: Returns a random float number between and min[inclusive] and max[exclusive].
Returns a random float number between and min [inclusive] and max [inclusive].

simplesect.para:
float - Random number in range Print(Math.RandomFloatInclusive(0,1));//0.0..1.0 Print(Math.RandomFloatInclusive(1,2));//1.0..2.0
>>0.3 >>2.0

briefdescription.para: Returns a random float number between and min [inclusive] and max [inclusive].

simplesect.para:
float - Random number in range 0.0 .. 1.0 Print(Math.RandomFloat01());//0.0..1.0
>>0.3 >>1.0

briefdescription.para: Sets the seed for the random number generator.

parameterdescription.para: int New seed for the random number generator, -1 will use time

simplesect.para:
int - Returns new seed Print(Math.Randomize(5));
>>5

briefdescription.para: Normalizes the angle (0...360)
Return relative difference between angles.
Return power of v ^ power.

simplesect.para:
float - The result of raising v to the given power Print(Math.Pow(2,4));//(2*2*2*2)=16
>>16

briefdescription.para: Returns the floating-point remainder of x/y rounded towards zero.

parameterdescription.para: float Value of the quotient numerator
float Value of the quotient denominator

briefdescription.para: Returns the floating-point remainder of x/y rounded to nearest.

parameterdescription.para: float Value of the quotient numerator
float Value of the quotient denominator

briefdescription.para: Returns absolute value.

simplesect.para:
float - Absolute value Print(Math.AbsFloat(-12.5));
>>12.5

briefdescription.para: Returns absolute value.

simplesect.para:
int - Absolute value Print(Math.AbsInt(-12));
>>12

briefdescription.para: Returns sign of given value.
Returns sign of given value.
Returns squared value.

simplesect.para:
float - Squared value Print(Math.SqrFloat(12.5));
>>156.25

briefdescription.para: Returns squared value.

simplesect.para:
int - Squared value Print(Math.SqrInt(12));
>>144

briefdescription.para: Returns square root.

simplesect.para:
float - Square of value Print(Math.Sqrt(25));
>>5

briefdescription.para: Returns the binary (base-2) logarithm of x.

parameterdescription.para: float Value whose logarithm is calculated.

simplesect.para:
float The binary logarithm of x: log2x. If x is negative, it causes a domain error: If x is zero, it may cause a pole error (depending on the library implementation). Print(Math.Log2(1.0));
>>0.0

briefdescription.para: Returns sinus of angle in radians.

simplesect.para:
float - Sinus of angle Print(Math.Sin(0.785398));//(45)
>>0.707107

briefdescription.para: Returns cosinus of angle in radians.

simplesect.para:
float - Cosinus of angle Print(Math.Cos(0.785398));//(45)
>>0.707107

briefdescription.para: Returns tangent of angle in radians.

simplesect.para:
float - Tangens of angle Print(Math.Tan(0.785398));//(45)
>>1

briefdescription.para: Returns angle in radians from sinus.

simplesect.para:
float - Angle in radians Print(Math.Asin(0.707107));//(sinus45)
>>0.785398

briefdescription.para: Returns angle in radians from cosinus.

simplesect.para:
float - Angle in radians Print(Math.Acos(0.707107));//(cosinus45)
>>0.785398

briefdescription.para: Returns angle in radians from tangent.

simplesect.para: float - Angle in radians

briefdescription.para: Returns angle in radians from tangent.

simplesect.para:
float - Angle in radians Print(Math.Atan2(1,1));
>>0.785398

briefdescription.para: Returns mathematical round of value.
Returns floor of value.
Returns ceil of value.
Returns wrap number to specified interval [min, max[.

simplesect.para:
float - number in specified interval [min, max[ Print(Math.WrapFloat(9.0,1.0,9.0));
>>1.0

briefdescription.para: Returns wrap number to specified interval [min, max].

simplesect.para:
float - number in specified interval [min, max] Print(Math.WrapFloatInclusive(9.0,1.0,9.0));
>>9.0

briefdescription.para: Returns wrap number to specified interval [0, max[.

simplesect.para:
float - number in specified interval [0, max[ Print(Math.WrapFloat0X(9.0,9.0));
>>0.0

briefdescription.para: Returns wrap number to specified interval [0, max].

simplesect.para:
float - number in specified interval [0, max] Print(Math.WrapFloat0X(9.0,9.0));
>>9.0

briefdescription.para: Returns wrap number to specified interval [min, max[.

simplesect.para:
int - number in specified interval [min, max[ Print(Math.WrapInt(9,1,9));
>>1

briefdescription.para: Returns wrap number to specified interval [0, max[.

simplesect.para:
int - number in specified interval [0, max[ Print(Math.WrapInt0X(9,9));
>>0

briefdescription.para: Clamps 'value' to 'min' if it is lower than 'min', or to 'max' if it is higher than 'max'.
Returns smaller of two given values.

simplesect.para:
float - min value Print(Math.Min(5.3,2.8));
>>2.8

briefdescription.para: Returns bigger of two given values.

simplesect.para:
float - max value Print(Math.Max(5.3,2.8));
>>5.3

briefdescription.para: Returns if value is between min and max (inclusive)

simplesect.para:
bool - if value is within range [min,max] Print(Math.IsInRange(6.9,3.6,9.3));
>>true

briefdescription.para: Returns if value is between min and max (inclusive)

simplesect.para:
bool - if value is within range [min,max] Print(Math.IsInRangeInt(6,3,9));
>>true

briefdescription.para: Linearly interpolates between 'a' and 'b' given 'time'.

parameterdescription.para: float Time [value needs to be between 0..1 for correct results, no auto clamp applied]

simplesect.para:
float - The interpolated result between the two float values. Print(Math.Lerp(3,7,0.5));
>>5

briefdescription.para: Calculates the linear value that produces the interpolant value within the range [a, b], it's an inverse of Lerp.

simplesect.para:
float - the time given the position between 'a' and 'b' given 'value', there is no clamp on 'value', to stay between [0..1] use 'value' between 'a' and 'b' Print(Math.InverseLerp(3,7,5));
>>0.5

briefdescription.para: Returns area of a right triangle.

parameterdescription.para: float Angle of corner bordering adjacent which is not the right corner (in radians)

simplesect.para: float - Area

briefdescription.para: Returns hypotenus of a right triangle.

parameterdescription.para: float Angle of corner bordering adjacent which is not the right corner (in radians)

simplesect.para: float - hypotenus

briefdescription.para: Returns if point is inside circle.

parameterdescription.para: vector Center of circle ([0] and [2] will be used, as a circle is 2D)
vector Point ([0] and [2] will be used, as a circle is 2D)

simplesect.para: bool - True when point is in circle

briefdescription.para: Returns if point is inside rectangle.

parameterdescription.para: vector Minimums of rectangle ([0] and [2] will be used, as a rectangle is 2D)
vector Maximums of rectangle ([0] and [2] will be used, as a rectangle is 2D)
vector Point ([0] and [2] will be used, as a rectangle is 2D)

simplesect.para: bool - True when point is in rectangle

memberdef.argsstring: (float val, float target, inout float velocity[], float smoothTime, float maxVelocity, float dt)
memberdef.name: SmoothCD

briefdescription.para: Does the CD smoothing function - easy in | easy out / S shaped smoothing.

parameterdescription.para: value we are reaching for -> Target
float[1] - array of ONE member - some kind of memory and actual accel/decel rate, need to be zeroed when filter is about to be reset
smoothing parameter, 0.1 .. 0.4 are resonable values, 0.1 is sharp, 0.4 is very smooth
maximal value change when multiplied by dt

simplesect.para: float smoothed/filtered value

briefdescription.para: occurences values above '12' will cause Factorial to overflow int.
values above '12' will cause int overflow
